title: AudioScrobbler
body: <p><a href="http://www.audioscrobbler.com/user/diesel_travis/" title="travis">I've</a> been using <a href="http://www.audioscrobbler.com" title="Audioscrobbler builds a profile of your musical taste">AudioScrobbler</a> for a little while now. It's a neat way to get stats on the music that you listen to and find out about similar artists and stuff like that. They have <a href="http://www.audioscrobbler.com/download.php" title="You need a plugin so that Audioscrobbler knows what sort of music you like :)">all kinds of plugins</a> too (Media Player, Winamp, XBox Media Center(!!) etc.).</p>
